level.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
level.text: This chapter modifies, limits, or supersedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C. § 7001 et seq.), but does not modify, limit, or supersede section 101(c) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7001(c)), or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in § 103(b) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7003(b)).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-125, see notes under § 16-4001.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 22 of the Uniform Collaborative Law Act. See Vol. 7 , Part 1B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
